body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

- spack add py-fenics-dolfinx ^petsc+mumps+hypre cflags="-O3" fflags="-O3"
- spack install

"mumps" and "scotch-6.1.1" are failed 

### Information on your system

spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.17.1-1061-18b83c3833
* **Python:** 3.9.10
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-cannonlake
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### Additional information

### Mumps
[spack-build-01-install-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8001511/spack-build-01-install-out.txt)
[spack-build-env-mods.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8001512/spack-build-env-mods.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8001513/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8001514/spack-build-out.txt)


### scotch

[spack-build-01-install-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8001552/spack-build-01-install-out.txt)

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: fenics (mumps" and "scotch-6.1.1 are failed )
